abstract: The F.D.A., which more than a year ago forced the closure of a G.E. surgical equipment plant in Salt Lake City because of quality problems, allowed it to re-open.
snippet: The F.D.A., which more than a year ago forced the closure of a G.E. surgical equipment plant in Salt Lake City because of quality problems, allowed it to re-open.
lead_paragraph: The Food and Drug Administration, which more than a year ago forced General Electric to close a surgical equipment plant in Salt Lake City because of manufacturing quality problems, gave the plant official approval to restart on Monday.
